Deficiency Narrative: A staff member does not have a completed affidavit.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted a corrective action plan for the cited standard. The operation will ensure that the signed and notarized affidavit are included in the employee binder on time, the LCCA will establish a clear timeline that aligns with the hiring process.  The LCCA will be responsible for compiling the affidavit conducting check-ins to monitor the progress.  Additionally, Make A Way RTC LLC 2.0 will implement a checklist to track the completion of each document, enduring nothing is overlooked before the onboarding date.

Deficiency Narrative: An employee chart did not have references on the employee hire form.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted a corrective action plan for the cited standard. The operation is to ensure that reference check forms and pre-employment screening assessments are included in the employee binder on time, the LCCA will establish a clear timeline that aligns with the hiring process.  The LCCA will be responsible for compiling the reference check document and the pre-employment screening assessments conducting check-ins to monitor the progress. Additionally, Make A Way RTC LLC 2.0 will implement a checklist to track the completion of each document, ensuring nothing is overlooked before the onboarding date.

Operation does not have a full time administrator
Correction Narrative: On 12/3/24, all documentation for the assigned administrator for the operation was provided via email and confirmed by phone call. Documentation will be uploaded into the digital library.

Deficiency Narrative: The agency did not have a filing storage for record keeping.
Correction Narrative: On 11/29/24 the operation submitted a video of the storage office where child and employee documents will be placed. This will be where child suicide screening and required privacy will be taken.
